#summary Defining and querying the List of the CO contributors

*List example #1*
== Defining the List of the CO contributors ==

{{{
# Snippet 1

@prefix rdf:     <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>.
@prefix co:  	 <http://purl.org/co/>.
@prefix foaf:  	 <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>.

<http://purl.org/co/example/1/list/1>
    a co:List;
    co:firstItem <http://www.hcklab.org/foaf.rdf#me> ;
    co:item :a1 ;
    co:lastItem :a2 .

:itemOne 
    a co:Item ,
    co:itemContent <http://www.hcklab.org/foaf.rdf#me> ;
    co:followedBy :itemTwo .

:itemTwo a co:Item ,
    co:itemContent :a1 ;
    co:followedBy :itemThree .

:itemThree a co:Item ,
    co:itemContent :a2 .
 		
<http://www.hcklab.org/foaf.rdf#me> 
    a foaf:Person ;
    foaf:firstName "Paolo" ;
    foaf:lastName "Ciccarese" .
    
:a1
    a foaf:Person ;
    foaf:firstName "Marco" ;
    foaf:lastName "Ocana" .
    
:a2
    a foaf:Person ;
    foaf:firstName "Silvio" ;
    foaf:lastName "Peroni" .
}}}
